name: Linda Loh Agogalyptic Rainbow
description:
@__lindaloh__ 
HD video loop with sound. 1:07.

A hidden location, recorded inside 3D browser based work "Agogalyptic", 2021, hosted on New Art City. 
 
Elements in the work have their origins in light sources, paintings, or landscape elements, which have then been distorted and transformed using various software tools. They were made as an exploration of the elusive form and materiality of digital space. The work connects with histories of the sublime, poetics, luminosity, and ethereal / ephemeral spaces.
